Docs.param: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignments at, above or below the scope for the specified principal.
The skipToken to apply on the operation. Use $skipToken={skiptoken} to return paged role assignments following the skipToken passed. Only supported on provider level calls.
Docs.summary: List all role assignments that apply to a scope. Request Path: /{scope}/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleAssignments Operation Id: RoleAssignments_ListForScope
Docs.returns: A collection of that may take multiple service requests to iterate over.
